title: AI for Healthcare Professionals
subtitle: HIPAA-Compliant AI Implementation for Clinical Excellence
description: A comprehensive training program designed for healthcare organizations implementing AI solutions. Covers HIPAA compliance, clinical decision support systems, patient data management, and responsible AI deployment in medical settings.
learning_objectives: Understand AI capabilities and limitations in clinical settings while maintaining patient safety
Implement AI solutions that comply with HIPAA, GDPR, and healthcare-specific regulations
Evaluate and deploy clinical decision support systems with appropriate human oversight
Manage patient data privacy and security in AI-powered healthcare applications
Develop governance frameworks for responsible AI use in medical contexts

modules.title: AI Foundations for Healthcare
modules.description: Understanding AI technology in the context of healthcare delivery and patient care
lessons: What is AI? Demystifying Machine Learning for Clinicians
Current AI Applications in Healthcare (Radiology, Pathology, EHR)
The Promise and Limitations of AI in Medicine
Case Studies: Successful AI Implementations in Hospitals

modules.title: HIPAA and Healthcare AI Compliance
modules.description: Navigating regulatory requirements for AI systems handling protected health information
lessons: HIPAA Privacy Rule and AI: What You Need to Know
Security Rule Compliance for AI Systems
Business Associate Agreements for AI Vendors
De-identification Requirements for AI Training Data
FDA Guidance on AI/ML-Based Medical Devices
State-Level Healthcare AI Regulations

modules.title: Clinical Decision Support Systems
modules.description: Implementing and managing AI-powered decision support tools
lessons: Types of Clinical Decision Support: Rules-Based vs. ML-Based
Evaluating CDS Effectiveness and Clinical Validity
Integration with EHR Workflows
Alert Fatigue and Optimization Strategies
Physician Override Protocols and Documentation

modules.title: Patient Data and AI Ethics
modules.description: Ethical considerations and patient data management for AI applications
lessons: Patient Consent for AI-Assisted Care
Bias in Healthcare AI: Identification and Mitigation
Health Equity Considerations in AI Deployment
Transparency and Explainability Requirements

modules.title: AI-Powered Diagnostics
modules.description: Understanding and implementing AI in diagnostic workflows
lessons: AI in Medical Imaging: Radiology, Pathology, Dermatology
Validation and Testing of Diagnostic AI
Workflow Integration and Radiologist Partnership
Quality Assurance for AI-Assisted Diagnoses

modules.title: Implementation and Governance
modules.description: Practical deployment and ongoing management of healthcare AI
lessons: Building Your Healthcare AI Governance Committee
Vendor Evaluation and Selection Criteria
Pilot Program Design and Success Metrics
Continuous Monitoring and Model Maintenance
Staff Training and Change Management

certification.name: Certified Healthcare AI Professional (CHAIP)
requirements: Complete all 6 modules with minimum 80% assessment score
Submit capstone project: AI Implementation Plan for Your Organization
Pass final comprehensive examination (100 questions, 70% minimum)
Complete 4 hours of hands-on lab exercises

includes: Access to healthcare AI community forum

tools: AI Bias Detection Framework for Healthcare
